title: Bard Bloom chroma pack does not work
body: I paid for this skin and would like it to work, please

replies.body: Chromas can't be selected for use in team builder if that's why you're having an issue. Make a custom game or play a blind pick and use the chroma you'd like to have selected. After the game starts or completes the chroma you had selected will be the default option next time you choose that champion (even in team builder) and the chroma will work. Since discovering this i haven't tried switching skins then back to the chroma without repeating the process so be wary of that. Hope this helped

Hey Murkinesis,

We're aware of issues with chroma packs not always 'sticking' in champion select. We don't have a root cause for this, so we don't have a fix for it at the moment.

That said, I use the Nami chroma pack a lot, and I've found that sliding to a different skin card and then clicking back to the chroma I want to use has successfully selected my chroma pack every time. It's obviously not the best case scenario, but it's a workaround I've found until we're able to nail down what's causing this. :c
I'm sure it's a bug with the client. It'll probably be fixed when the new client comes, if it's not using too much of the same architecture.

I can say it's only for certain players. I've never had a single issue with the Chroma Bard pack. 

Then again I have all of his skins so. D: It's only when I want to use a different color to be fancy that I use it.
Yeah, it's not a 100% repro case, unfortunately. D:

Well! My heart to those that have to deal with it! I think the biggest issue I have with Bard's skins is that they're all so good. D: and like. yeah. 

I DON'T KNOW WHICH ONE I WANT TO USE NEXT. ;_;
I'm facing with the same problem with nemesis jax ONLY on team builder
